Package listeners

Interface PetrinetComponentChangedListener

public interface PetrinetComponentChangedListener

The listener interface for receiving events signifying components of a petrinet have changed.

It provides methods for informing the PetrinetGraph that the data model of the petrinet has changed and therefore has to be updated.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    onEdgeAdded(PetrinetElement source, PetrinetElement target, String id)

    When an element has been added it should be added to the PetrinetGraph also.
    void
    onPetrinetElementCoordinatesChanged(PetrinetElement element)
    When coordinates are set for an element they should be updated in the PetrinetGraph also.
    void
    onPetrinetElementLabelChanged(PetrinetElement element)
    When a label for an element is changed it needs to be changed in the PetrinetGraph also.
    void
    onPetrinetElementRemoved(PetrinetElement element)
    When an element is removed it should be removed from the PetrinetGraph also.
    void
    onPlaceTokenCountChanged(Place place)
    When the count of tokens of a place has changed it needs to be changed in the PetrinetGraph also.
    void
    onTransitionStateChanged(Transition transition)
    When a transition is (de-)activated the PetrinetGraph needs to be updated.

      When coordinates are set for an element they should be updated in the PetrinetGraph also.
      Parameters:
      element - the element for which coordinates need to be reset

    • onEdgeAdded

      void onEdgeAdded(PetrinetElement source, PetrinetElement target, String id)
      When an edge is added it should be added in the PetrinetGraph also.
      Parameters:
      source - the source element of the edge
      target - the target element of the edge
      id - the id of the edge

    • onEdgeRemoved

      void onEdgeRemoved(PetrinetElement source, PetrinetElement target)
      When an edge is removed it should be removed from the PetrinetGraph also.
      Parameters:
      source - the source element for the edge to be removed
      target - the targets element for the edge to be removed

    • onPlaceTokenCountChanged

      When a transition is (de-)activated the PetrinetGraph needs to be updated.
      Parameters:
